profile.name: Jayditch Balansi
profile.title: Full-Stack Developer & AI Automation Engineer
profile.summary: Full-stack developer with over four years of experience building and maintaining scalable web applications and automation systems. Strong focus on backend development, API integrations, workflow automation, and AI-assisted tools.

experience.summary: Worked on high-traffic internal platforms focused on content moderation, HR systems, lead generation, and workflow automation.

projects.name: Content Moderation Platform
projects.description: Developed a high-performance content moderation system that connects clients, AI services, and human moderators to review text, images, and videos.
responsibilities: Built scalable backend systems for content review workflows
Integrated AI APIs for automated content flagging
Implemented real-time communication using Redis and Socket.io
Acted as project maintainer and participated in technical decision-making

projects.name: Human Resource Management System
projects.description: Designed and developed an HR management system to automate onboarding, leave management, payroll, and performance tracking.
responsibilities: Designed scalable database schemas for employee data
Ensured secure handling of sensitive information
Optimized queries for efficient data retrieval

projects.name: Lead Generation System
projects.description: Built a platform to automate collecting, managing, and tracking leads from multiple channels.
responsibilities: Implemented lead validation and deduplication logic
Designed database schema for filtering and segmentation

projects.name: Automation and AI Systems
projects.description: Developed automation workflows to replace manual processes using n8n and AI integrations.
responsibilities: Built automated workflows for biometric validation
Integrated fine-tuned AI models to improve accuracy
Reduced manual intervention and processing time

projects.name: AI Image Generator and Editor
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered image generation and editing platform using third-party AI services.
responsibilities: Integrated AI image generation using text prompts
Implemented region-based image editing using brush and bounding box selection
Built an image gallery for AI-generated content

projects.name: Instagram Reels Data Fetcher
projects.description: Built a system to search Instagram users and fetch associated Reels content using official and third-party APIs.
responsibilities: Integrated Meta API for Instagram user search
Fetched and displayed Instagram Reels data
Optimized API calls for performance and rate limits

projects.name: Social Media Platform
projects.description: Maintained and enhanced a social media system with video and file streaming features.

projects.name: ERP System
projects.description: Contributed to the development and enhancement of an ERP system.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology
